summary: The 7 earrings for Khajiit as craftable jewelry.
descriptionHtml:
Male and female, but Khajiit only, on an non Khajiit they will not show up but you can equip them, small chance of converting character to Khajiit at an later time :o) 

Benefits: 1) you can match any hairs with any earrings, 2) uses the ear slot so they can be used with circlets. 3) with mods who let ears poke trough hats they can be used with hats. 
4) enchantable as an head slot. 

Downside, if you have an hairstyle with lots of earrings you will not see them, world model is just an gold ring, however they would be an bit small anyway. 

 Craftable with an gold ingot under jewelry.
author: Zaria
